backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a message store with CRUD operations (send, edit, delete, query) using a Map keyed by message ID, with migration support for upgrading from an older schema.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old messages (keyed by timestamp Text) to new messages (keyed by Nat ID) by iterating entries and assigning sequential IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: app name update to 'Alatele', delete/edit message buttons, and React Query hooks for mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, hooks, utilities, and styling for the messaging application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with a teal/cyan palette avoiding blue and purple tones.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'alatele2'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing username state via session storage and conditionally rendering UsernameEntry or MessagingInterface based on authentication status.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying alpha logo, app name 'Alatele', current username, and logout button with sticky positioning.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input form with textarea supporting Enter to send and Shift+Enter for new lines, with loading state during submission.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Message list rendering chat messages with avatars, timestamps, and inline edit/delete functionality for the current user's own messages using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/MessagingInterfa: Main messaging layout orchestrating Header, MessageList, MessageInput, and footer with auto-scroll and loading states using the useMessages hook.
frontend/src/components/UsernameEntry.ts: Username entry screen with alpha logo branding and card layout allowing users to enter any username to join the chat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the ICP actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: React Query hooks for message operations including fetching all messages with 2-second polling, sending messages, deleting messages, and editing messages with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for colors, borders, and other UI properties.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens matching the CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the 'alatele' messaging app features including username entry, real-time messaging, alpha symbol branding, and message edit/delete capabilities with feature versioning and requirements mapping.
